authors: A collection derived from the web community (Reddit,Pinterest,DmsGuild,ecc.). For credits, authors are provided with a web link in the entity description

monster.name: Alodon, the Red Lion of Afeonia
monster.shortName: Alodon, the Red Lion of Afeonia

trait.name: Legendary Resistances (3/day)
entries: Whenever Alodon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rage Against
entries: For every 58 hit points Alodon loses, the damage he deals with melee attacks increases by 2.

trait.name: Scounge Marked
entries: Alodon is entirely immune to poison, disease, and the Scourge.

trait.name: Last Stand of the Dynasty (Half HP)
entries: Upon falling to 290 HP, Alodon regains some semblance of his wits, becoming an even more dangerous foe. He gains access to his Mythic Actions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Alodon takes four attacks with his Claws and one with his Stunning Kick. If he is in his Last Stand, he takes three attacks with either his Sundered Blade or his Blackblood Flame Rift and then one Stunning Kick.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stunning Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) bludgeoning damage  and is pushed 20ft. away. Additionally, the target must make a Con save {@dc 17} or be Stunned until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Sundered Blade (Mythic)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) slashing damage, plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage and their maximum HP is reduced by an amount equal to the fire damage taken.

action.name: Blackblood Flame Rift (Mythic)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) fire damage and their maximum HP is reduced by an amount equal to the fire damage taken.

reaction.name: Avenging Attacks
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, Alodon can make two Claw attacks against the one who hit him. Alternatively, while in Last Stand, he can use either of his Mythic attacks against both melee and ranged attackers.

reaction.name: Oathblood Resilience
entries: As a reaction to taking damage from any source, Alodon can grant himself resistance to the damage.

legendaryHeader: Alodon gets 5 Legendary Actions per round. Upon using one, he regains his Reaction if he has lost it.

legendary.name: Stunning Kick (Costs 2 actions)
entries: Alodon takes an attack with his Stunning Kick.

legendary.name: Feral Leap (Costs 1 action)
entries: Alodon leaps to a space he can see within 30ft without provoking attacks of opportunity.

legendary.name: Daunting Roar (Costs 2 actions)
entries: Alodon unleashes a terrifying battle cry. AIl enemies within who can hear him must make a Wisdom saving throw {@dc 17} or become Frightened of him for 1 minute. They can repeat this saving throw at the end of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

mythicHeader: While he still has access to the above actions, he gains these upon entering Last Stand.

mythic.name: Father's Thoms (Costs 2 actions)
entries: Alodon casts the Wall of Thorns spell. For him, it does not require concentration, but he cannot have more than one wall up at a time. The DC for saves against the spell is 22.

mythic.name: Blackblood Flame Pounce (Costs 3 actions)
entries: Alodon uses his Feral Leap, but when he lands, all creatures within 15ft of his new space must make a Dexterity saving throw {@dc 17} or take 33 ({@damage 5d12}) fire damage, taking half as much on a success. Their maximum hit points are reduced by the amount of fire damage taken.
